title: Earthward
description: Over one-hundred years ago, the surface was destroyed by a terrible evil, forcing surviving civilization underground. Explore a vast world filled to the brim with creatures and critters...but beware the various secrets lurking in the caves! Craft armor and weapons, fight powerful monsters, and reclaim the surface for all who dwell beneath it.

title: Bitlands
description: The Bitlands have plunged into chaos. As a rebel, you must explore a war-torn world to find and overthrow the corrupt king of the Bitlands. With the help of magical allies found along the way, you might just end up saving the world!

title: Koko: The Last Leaf
description: Delve into a mysterious world of Gods and magic as the last of the leaf kind. Fight epic battles for revenge against evil forces. Explore fantastical lands inhabited with magical creatures and peculiar allies. Search for the realm of the Gods and stop them from making a grave mistake.

title: Lilypad Lowdown
description: Play as Lilly the Frog, who wants nothing more than to keep her children safe from the vicious toad army. Fight your way through the frog armada and defeat Lord Gulch before time runs out!

title: Paradigm
description: Beckett awakes, and equipped with the ability to make copies of himself, he must navigate a world that is hostile to anyone who goes alone...but he's not alone...not really. To solve the puzzles, you'll have to think differently: in plurality rather then singularity. Will you follow the pattern? Or become the Paradigm?

title: Daisy's Quest
description: Death isn't always bad. Traverse a wacky world of characters and puzzles by using your corpse as a platform!

title: Fresh Fruits
description: In this supermarket, the produce comes alive! Play as an avocado, traversing procedurally generated rooms while discovering new abilities, so you can defeat the evil fruit and escape the supermarket.

title: Seashore Siege
description: Fight sea creatures and create a sandy defense to protect your sandcastle kingdom! Seashore Siege is a top-down tower defense game with a unique cast of creatures and towers. Collect sand dollars to purchase and place towers, and try to get the highest score on the leaderboard!

title: Otherglow
description: Built for windows and created using DirectX 11, this engine is currently being made to develop 'Otherglow', a first person RPG. It features a lighting engine, editor, collision physics, and serializable game components.

title: Earth Engine
description: Earth Engine is a cross-platform game engine developed in C# using the Monogame Framework. Notable features include a custom runtime, prefab editor, tile editor, lighting, collisions, physics, and spatial audio. It is currently being used to make 'The Legend of Ayla', a narrative-heavy RPG in the likeness of The Legend of Zelda.

title: Lynx Engine
description: Lynx Engine was developed with a team of seven people, used to make the game 'Fresh Fruits'. It works as a general 2D game engine with heavily abstracted C++ scripting. It features a robust graphics pipeline, shader support, collision, physics, ImGui, level serialization, custom math libraries, and many gameplay components.

title: Graphics Engine
description: This engine was created with the sole purpose of learning more about game engines and the graphics pipeline. It can generate vertices for 3D objects, and light them using simple point lights, all done in DirectX 11.

title: Portfolio
description: The website you're currently using is made using Javascript, CSS, and HTML. It features project slides, carousels, and a custom video player, complete with thumbnails, backgrounds, and trailers! Data is completely serialized as JSON objects, making it easy to add a new project.

title: Archery Overhaul
description: Tired of using the same old bow and arrow? Look no further! Archery Overhaul adds 150+ items, including new weapons, accessories, materials, and NPCs. Explore several new crafting trees with fully completed progression, even up to the Moonlord!

title: Spear Overhaul
description: Spear Overhaul adds 20 new spears to establish a progression for the spear sub-class! Spears can now be thrown, dealing spear damage, which is increased by crafting new gear and accessories.

title: Sorcery Overhaul
description: There's a lot of magic in Terraria, but sometimes it can be underwhelming. Sorcery Overhaul adds 100+ items, ranging from tomes, staffs, accessories, and more! Explore new weapon progressions and armor sets as well as new mana based mechanics.

title: Riptide's Mod
description: Want to make a Terraria mod? Learn how tModloader works by watching the YouTube series where I make swords, staffs, armor, and more! Understand basic programming principles and how to apply them to make engaging and fun mods.

title: Room Editor
description: Create and design your own levels by painting tiles and placing objects. All data is exported to JSON, making it practical for several game engines. This tool was made for chunk-based generation in Earthward.

title: Budget Master
description: A comprehensive budget management application that helps users track expenses, set financial goals, and visualize spending patterns. Features include expense categorization, budget planning, and graph visualization of spending.

title: Kira AI Agent
description: An intelligent AI agent designed to assist with various tasks including data analysis, automation, and decision support. Built with modern AI technologies to provide contextual and helpful responses.

title: Earth Edit
description: Create and edit items, accessories, and more using preset data schemas that can export to JSON. Shows a display of all images related to the open item. This tool was made primarily for Earthward.

title: Behavior Tree Editor
description: Create a simple behavior tree with action nodes, decorators, and composite nodes, all completely customizable. Save to a .bt file or export to json. This tool was made for enemy AI in Earthward.
